PSCT.Vegas:
① During Damage Calculation, if a Beast-Warrior "Bujin" monster you control battles an opponent's monster (Quick): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; 
the ATK of your monster becomes double its original ATK, during that Damage Calculation only.
